mapper.insert: INSERT INTO customer (cus_id, cus_pw, cus_name, cus_nickname, cus_birthday, cus_profile, cus_phonenum ) VALUES (#{id}, #{pw}, #{name}, #{nickname}, #{birthday}, #{profile}, #{phonenum})
mapper.update: UPDATE customer SET cus_enable=0 WHERE cus_id = #{id}
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM authority WHERE cus_id = #{param1} AND cus_auth = #{param2}
mapper.select:
SELECT cus_uid uid, cus_id id, cus_pw pw, cus_name name, cus_nickname nickname, cus_birthday birthday, cus_profile profile, cus_phonenum phonenum, cus_enable enable
FROM customer WHERE cus_id = #{id}
SELECT cus_id FROM customer WHERE cus_id = #{id}
SELECT cus_id id FROM customer WHERE cus_name = #{name} and cus_phonenum=#{phonenum}
SELECT cus_nickname FROM customer WHERE cus_nickname = #{nickname}
SELECT cus_pw pw, cus_id id, cus_name name, cus_phonenum phonenum FROM customer WHERE cus_id= #{id} and cus_name = #{name} and cus_phonenum = #{phonenum}

SELECT cus_uid uid, cus_id id, cus_pw pw, cus_name name, cus_nickname nickname, cus_birthday birthday, cus_phonenum phonenum
FROM customer WHERE cus_uid = #{uid}

SELECT cus_uid uid, cus_id id, cus_pw pw, cus_name name, cus_nickname nickname, cus_birthday birthday, cus_phonenum phonenum
FROM customer WHERE cus_enable = 1 ORDER BY cus_uid DESC LIMIT #{from}, #{pageRows}
